title: Kate Beckinsale 'signs off on property settlement' with Len Wiseman as exes seek to finalize divorce
text:
She split from her husband Len Wiseman in late 2015.

And on Sunday, it was reported that Kate Beckinsale has finally settled her divorce from her Underworld director.

The actress, 46, has agreed to allow a private judge to sign off on the division of property she's agreed with the filmmaker, according to TheBlast.com Sunday.

Legal conclusion: Kate Beckinsale has agreed to sign off on a property settlement with director Len Wiseman in order to finalize their divorce, TheBlast.com reported Sunday

Wiseman, 46, filed for divorce on October 25, 2016, citing 'irreconcilable differences'.

The outlet reported that in recent weeks, Beckinsale deeded a property in the Hollywood Hills to Wiseman.

The actress had wanted to keep her jewelry and all her earnings from the date of separation.

Exes: The couple, pictured in March 2014, wed in May 2004 and separated in late 2015. Wiseman filed for divorce on October 25, 2016, citing 'irreconcilable differences'

On set romance: The British actress and the American director fell in love while making the 2003 movie Underworld, pictured

First love: Their romance ended Beckinsale's relationship with actor Michael Sheen, whom she had first started dating in 1995. The two, pictured in 2006, share a daughter Lily, now 20

The couple married in May 2004 after falling in love on the set of 2003's Underworld, which co-starred Beckinsale's then partner Michael Sheen.

Ironically, it had been Beckinsale who had persuaded Wiseman to cast Sheen in the movie that would lead to the demise of their relationship.

She had been with Sheen since 1995 and the two have a daughter together, Lily, now 20.

Natural beauty: Beckinsale made an appearance Sunday on The Tonight Show With Jimmy Fallon, looking sensational in a white embellished ensemble

Sweet tooth: She shared a video to her instagram showing her as she got her hair and makeup done. She was surprised with a bag of English candiesby her stylist Chase Aston

Beckinsale made headlines earlier this year when she started dating SNL star and comedian Pete Davidson following the end of his engagement to Ariana gr5ande.

The romance fizzled out, though, after just four months.

Her other loves since splitting from Wiseman include English comedian and actor Jack Whitehall and American comedian Matt Rife.
description: The actress, 46, has agreed to allow a private judge to sign off on the division of property  she's agreed with the filmmaker, according to TheBlast.com Sunday.
